Ans. Fitrah is that mones which ty paid to the poor on the eve of Eid-ul-Fitr Allah Taala ordered the
Muslims to pay Fitrana before the praver of Fid-ul-Fitr so that the poor may also celebrate Eid-
ul-fitr and enjoy this day
(b) How do people express their love for one another on occasion of Eid? Explain. 3

feelings and put their differences to end It develops the relation of love and brotherhood.
Moreover, there are bry gatherings on the eve of Eid and they are symbol of untty, power and
co-operation, Thes show that all the Muslims are like a family.

sacrificial animal and we distribute us meat In the meanwhile. my mother prepares delicious
food We luke it together
